aria-label.description: required when icon is used with no supporting text

buttonId.description: Optional id for the button within the toggle group item

className.description: Additional classes added to the toggle group item

icon.description: Icon rendered inside the toggle group item (React component or element)

iconPosition.description: Sets position of the icon when text is also passed in

isDisabled.description: Flag indicating if the toggle group item is disabled

isSelected.description: Flag indicating if the toggle group item is selected

onChange.description: A callback for when the toggle group item selection changes. (Type: (event: React.MouseEvent<any> | React.KeyboardEvent | MouseEvent, selected: boolean) => void)

text.description: Text rendered inside the toggle group item (React component or element)
